reviews.text: I enjoyed staying at this hotel very much during our stay in Madrid. The rooms were very spacious and comfortable (including the bathroom). The location is central and very walkable to many tourist sights. However, it was still quiet at night since it is not right on the main shopping street (Gran Via). I will definitely be staying again if I come back!

The most professional hotelier service I've experienced in a while. The room quality and design taste were at a 5-star level, with added touches like slippers and a robe. The room was spacious and well-equipped with a nice work desk. The bathroom was very clean with a usable bathtub. The location is excellent, right in the middle of the city yet hidden in a quiet square. They also had a secure room to hold your luggage, which guaranteed peace of mind. I'll definitely return.

Great hotel in a great location! Very easy to walk to so many attractions across east and west Madrid! The desk staff members were all exceptional- so friendly and so helpful! The hotel is very quaint and feels like a boutique hotel with bit beautiful wood stairs. The room was really nice and the gym- while small- has everything you need- plus an amazing view while you work out!

The Hotel and staff are amazing! Wil only stay there when we come back! The hotel is just about perfect in all aspects! Location, Cleanliness, stylish. The staff is so helpful and welcoming! Just loved it here! You are close to all the major attractions. All within walking distance! Easy access to all transportation!
Lovely hotel. Great staff. Great location - you can walk to all major sites. Gym and spa are a bit small. A rooftop bar would have been a good idea
